source:
%%sql
-- Build ims_attribute_dim table -- merge

-- Notes - Addresses are only supplied for Inspectors - need to check inspector count against addresses data

-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_attribute_dim_new 

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number IS NULL
        THEN T3.IMSAttributeID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                                                         AS IMSAttributeID, -- surrogate key
    'No Info' AS BDCAIDLegacy,
    'No Info' AS AttributeID,
    IFNULL(T1.name, 'No Info') AS BDCAttributeName,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number, 'No Info') AS BDCAttributeNumber,
    IFNULL(T1.bcd_attribute_num_container, concat('BDC A - ',T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number)) AS BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
    IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_name_container_c, 'No Info') AS BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
    IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_num_container, 'No Info') AS BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    IFNULL(T1.is_this_personal_data_c, 'No Info') AS IsPersonalData,
    IFNULL(T1.minimise_after_processing_c, 'No Info') AS MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
    IFNULL(T1.help, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeHelp,
    IFNULL(T1.is_this_special_category_data, 'No Info') AS IsSpecialCategoryData,
    IFNULL(T1.retention_period, 'No Info') AS RetentionPeriod,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1, 'No Info') AS IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1_name, 'No Info') AS IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1ims_bdc_entity_ida, 'No Info') AS IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
    IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1, 'No Info') AS IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
    IFNULL(T1.user_id_c, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeUserIDC,
    IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
    'No Info' AS IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
    'No Info' AS IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
    IFNULL(T1.type, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeType,
    IFNULL(T1.status, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeStatus,
    IFNULL(T1.priority, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributePriority,
    IFNULL(T1.resolution, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeResolution,
    IFNULL(T1.work_log, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeWorkLog,
    IFNULL(T1.date_modified, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeDateModified,
    IFNULL(T1.SecurityGroups, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeSecurityGroups,
    IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeAssignedUserID,
    IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_link, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeAssignedUserLink,
    IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeAssignedUserName,
    IFNULL(T1.created_by, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeCreatedBy,
    IFNULL(T1.created_by_link, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeCreatedByLink,
    IFNULL(T1.created_by_name, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeCreatedByName,
    IFNULL(T1.date_entered, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeDateEntered,
    IFNULL(T1.deleted, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeDeleted,
    IFNULL(T1.description, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeDescription,
    IFNULL(T1.modified_by_name, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeModifiedByName,
    IFNULL(T1.modified_user_id, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeModifiedByUserID,
    IFNULL(T1.modified_user_link, 'No Info') AS IMSAttributeModifiedByUserLink,
    T2.SourceSystemID                                                           AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)                                              AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                                                        AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat( 
        '.', 
        '.', 
        IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bcd_attribute_num_container,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_name_container_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_num_container,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.is_this_personal_data_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.minimise_after_processing_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.is_this_special_category_data,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.retention_period,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1ims_bdc_entity_ida,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.user_id_c,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c,'.'), 
        '.',
        '.',
        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.SecurityGroups,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by_link,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.created_by_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.date_entered,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.deleted,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.description,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_by_name,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_id,'.'), 
        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_link,'.')))                                     AS RowID, 
    'Y'                                                                         AS IsActive, 
    T3.IsActive                                                                 AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_attribute_new T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON  "IMS" = T2.Description AND 
        T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.ims_attribute_dim T3 
    ON  T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number = T3.BDCAttributeNumber AND 
        T3.IsActive = 'Y'

WHERE
        -- flags new data        
        ( CASE
            WHEN    T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number = T3.BDCAttributeNumber AND 
                    md5(concat(
                        '.', 
                        '.', 
                        IFNULL(T1.name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.bcd_attribute_num_container,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_name_container_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.bdc_entity_num_container,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.is_this_personal_data_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.minimise_after_processing_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.help,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.is_this_special_category_data,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.retention_period,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_entity_ims_bdc_attribute_1ims_bdc_entity_ida,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ims_bdc_attribute_ims_master_data_map_1,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.user_id_c,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.information_owner_c,'.'), 
                        '.',
                        '.',
                        IFNULL(T1.type,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.status,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.priority,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.resolution,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.work_log,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.SecurityGroups,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_id,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_link,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.assigned_user_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.created_by,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.created_by_link,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.created_by_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_entered,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.deleted,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.description,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.modified_by_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_id,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.modified_user_link,'.')))  <> T3.RowID     
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.IMSAttributeID IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.ims_bdc_attribute_number IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.ims_attribute_new);

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **ims_attribute_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View ims_attribute_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql

-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW ims_attribute_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSAttributeID,
    BDCAIDLegacy,
    AttributeID,
    BDCAttributeName,
    BDCAttributeNumber,
    BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
    BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
    BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    IsPersonalData,
    MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
    IMSAttributeHelp,
    IsSpecialCategoryData,
    RetentionPeriod,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
    IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
    IMSAttributeUserIDC,
    IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
    IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
    IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
    IMSAttributeType,
    IMSAttributeStatus,
    IMSAttributePriority,
    IMSAttributeResolution,
    IMSAttributeWorkLog,
    IMSAttributeDateModified,
    IMSAttributeSecurityGroups,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserID,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserLink,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserName,
    IMSAttributeCreatedBy,
    IMSAttributeCreatedByLink,
    IMSAttributeCreatedByName,
    IMSAttributeDateEntered,
    IMSAttributeDeleted,
    IMSAttributeDescription,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByName,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByUserID,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByUserLink,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
From ims_attribute_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT DISTINCT
    IMSAttributeID,
    BDCAIDLegacy,
    AttributeID,
    BDCAttributeName,
    BDCAttributeNumber,
    BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
    BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
    BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    IsPersonalData,
    MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
    IMSAttributeHelp,
    IsSpecialCategoryData,
    RetentionPeriod,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
    IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
    IMSAttributeUserIDC,
    IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
    IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
    IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
    IMSAttributeType,
    IMSAttributeStatus,
    IMSAttributePriority,
    IMSAttributeResolution,
    IMSAttributeWorkLog,
    IMSAttributeDateModified,
    IMSAttributeSecurityGroups,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserID,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserLink,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserName,
    IMSAttributeCreatedBy,
    IMSAttributeCreatedByLink,
    IMSAttributeCreatedByName,
    IMSAttributeDateEntered,
    IMSAttributeDeleted,
    IMSAttributeDescription,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByName,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByUserID,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByUserLink,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_attribute_dim
WHERE BDCAttributeNumber IN (SELECT BDCAttributeNumber FROM ims_attribute_dim_new WHERE IMSAttributeID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM ims_attribute_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW ims_attribute_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    IMSAttributeID,
    BDCAIDLegacy,
    AttributeID,
    BDCAttributeName,
    BDCAttributeNumber,
    BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
    BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
    BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    IsPersonalData,
    MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
    IMSAttributeHelp,
    IsSpecialCategoryData,
    RetentionPeriod,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
    IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
    IMSAttributeUserIDC,
    IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
    IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
    IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
    IMSAttributeType,
    IMSAttributeStatus,
    IMSAttributePriority,
    IMSAttributeResolution,
    IMSAttributeWorkLog,
    IMSAttributeDateModified,
    IMSAttributeSecurityGroups,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserID,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserLink,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserName,
    IMSAttributeCreatedBy,
    IMSAttributeCreatedByLink,
    IMSAttributeCreatedByName,
    IMSAttributeDateEntered,
    IMSAttributeDeleted,
    IMSAttributeDescription,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByName,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByUserID,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByUserLink,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM ims_attribute_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View ims_attribute_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. Pers_No from SAP HR), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_attribute_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.ims_attribute_dim AS Target
USING ims_attribute_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.IMSAttributeID = Target.IMSAttributeID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (IMSAttributeID,
        BDCAIDLegacy,
        AttributeID,
        BDCAttributeName,
        BDCAttributeNumber,
        BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
        BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
        BDCEntityNumberContainer,
        IsPersonalData,
        MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
        IMSAttributeHelp,
        IsSpecialCategoryData,
        RetentionPeriod,
        IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
        IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
        IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
        IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
        IMSAttributeUserIDC,
        IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
        IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
        IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
        IMSAttributeType,
        IMSAttributeStatus,
        IMSAttributePriority,
        IMSAttributeResolution,
        IMSAttributeWorkLog,
        IMSAttributeDateModified,
        IMSAttributeSecurityGroups,
        IMSAttributeAssignedUserID,
        IMSAttributeAssignedUserLink,
        IMSAttributeAssignedUserName,
        IMSAttributeCreatedBy,
        IMSAttributeCreatedByLink,
        IMSAttributeCreatedByName,
        IMSAttributeDateEntered,
        IMSAttributeDeleted,
        IMSAttributeDescription,
        IMSAttributeModifiedByName,
        IMSAttributeModifiedByUserID,
        IMSAttributeModifiedByUserLink,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.IMSAttributeID,
        Source.BDCAIDLegacy,
        Source.AttributeID,
        Source.BDCAttributeName,
        Source.BDCAttributeNumber,
        Source.BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
        Source.BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
        Source.BDCEntityNumberContainer,
        Source.IsPersonalData,
        Source.MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
        Source.IMSAttributeHelp,
        Source.IsSpecialCategoryData,
        Source.RetentionPeriod,
        Source.IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
        Source.IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
        Source.IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
        Source.IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
        Source.IMSAttributeUserIDC,
        Source.IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
        Source.IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
        Source.IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
        Source.IMSAttributeType,
        Source.IMSAttributeStatus,
        Source.IMSAttributePriority,
        Source.IMSAttributeResolution,
        Source.IMSAttributeWorkLog,
        Source.IMSAttributeDateModified,
        Source.IMSAttributeSecurityGroups,
        Source.IMSAttributeAssignedUserID,
        Source.IMSAttributeAssignedUserLink,
        Source.IMSAttributeAssignedUserName,
        Source.IMSAttributeCreatedBy,
        Source.IMSAttributeCreatedByLink,
        Source.IMSAttributeCreatedByName,
        Source.IMSAttributeDateEntered,
        Source.IMSAttributeDeleted,
        Source.IMSAttributeDescription,
        Source.IMSAttributeModifiedByName,
        Source.IMSAttributeModifiedByUserID,
        Source.IMSAttributeModifiedByUserLink,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive) ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.ims_attribute_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new SecureInfoID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.ims_attribute_dim 

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY IMSAttributeID NULLS LAST) AS IMSAttributeID,
    BDCAIDLegacy,
    AttributeID,
    BDCAttributeName,
    BDCAttributeNumber,
    BDCAttributeNumberContainer,
    BDCEntityNumberContainerC,
    BDCEntityNumberContainer,
    IsPersonalData,
    MinimiseAfterProcessingC,
    IMSAttributeHelp,
    IsSpecialCategoryData,
    RetentionPeriod,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttribute,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeName,
    IMSBDCEntityIMSBDCAttributeIMSBDCEntityIDA,
    IMSBDCAttributeIMSMasterDataMap,
    IMSAttributeUserIDC,
    IMSAttributeInformationOwnerC,
    IMSAttributeUserIDOneC,
    IMSAttributeInformationExpertC,
    IMSAttributeType,
    IMSAttributeStatus,
    IMSAttributePriority,
    IMSAttributeResolution,
    IMSAttributeWorkLog,
    IMSAttributeDateModified,
    IMSAttributeSecurityGroups,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserID,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserLink,
    IMSAttributeAssignedUserName,
    IMSAttributeCreatedBy,
    IMSAttributeCreatedByLink,
    IMSAttributeCreatedByName,
    IMSAttributeDateEntered,
    IMSAttributeDeleted,
    IMSAttributeDescription,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByName,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByUserID,
    IMSAttributeModifiedByUserLink,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.ims_attribute_dim ;
